title: similar font?
content:
I made these characters but I need a whole typeface similar to these characters. Anyone an idea?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100409151922im_/http:/typophile.com/files/honger_4974.jpg)
author: merelschenk

comments.content:
As already written, it's difficult to find a typeface whith such a low-waisted R, but rather regular E and H.  
One is Le Gendarmerie:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/gautier/le-gendarmerie/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100409151922/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gautier/le-gendarmerie/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/gautier/le-gendarmerie/")  
Which, unfortunately, has the "wrong" G.  
If you have a healty budget, you can mix Neutra e Neutra no. 2.
